page.shortlink: api objects security object get last password changed date method
page.description: Gets the date/time for when a user's password was last set.

argument.name: UserName
argument.description: The name of the user. If no user name is specified the current user will be used.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the date a user's password was last set.

page.discussion: Context.Security.GetLastPasswordChangedDate() gets the date/time for when a user's password was last set. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
